title: Football Live Scores
description:
Most popular and extensive Football/Soccer live score app for android.
Football Mania has more than 1000 leagues, 10.000 teams and 100.000 players from countries all over the world.
Subscribe on matches, teams or entire leagues to receive fast push notifications and you will never miss a goal
Interested in more background? Tons of statistics, images from your favorite players/teams
All completely free.
Features:
- Schedules/fixtures overviews per country/league
- Live tables during soccer matches
- Topscores
- Live football statistics (ball possession, shots on goal etc)
- Player information
- Team information
- Substitutions
- Match voting
- Match videos
- Commenting and chats
